response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. I believe its worth far exceeds $1,200,000, but I am offering it to you at this exceptional price due to the special circumstances surrounding its availability.

This product is not just an item; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. It has the potential to significantly impact your endeavors and bring about positive changes in your life or business. I understand that the value of such a product may be subjective, but I trust that you will appreciate its true worth.

To secure this opportunity, I am offering you the chance to purchase the product for $1,200,000. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the acquisition. I am more than happy to provide additional information or answer any questions you might have.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
